hero.headline: Peace, space and hospitality in the heart of the Schermer polder.
hero.subline: Escape the rush of everyday life and experience the real Dutch countryside — where silence, comfort and nature come together.

intro.paragraph_1: When we first saw this historic house in Schermerhorn, we knew instantly: this is where we want to create something special.
intro.paragraph_2: We’re Bas & Linda, and we’ve turned this house into our dream place — one we love sharing with you. Whether you’re here to unwind, explore the surroundings or simply recharge — you’ll feel right at home from the moment you arrive.

testimonial.quote: We felt at home right away — everything we needed was there.
testimonial.author: Sofie, July 2025

features.title: Peaceful Surroundings
features.text: So quiet and calm, with stunning views across the fields.

features.title: Comfort & Cleanliness
features.text: Everything was spotless and beautifully decorated.

features.title: Perfect Location
features.text: Only 30 minutes to the beach, Alkmaar or Amsterdam.

features.title: Personal Welcome
features.text: Bas and Linda think of everything and give great tips.

surroundings.paragraph: From Schermer Eylandt, you can discover the best of North Holland: the historic city of Alkmaar, the dunes, the windmills of De Rijp and the nearby beaches — all within easy reach. After a day full of discoveries, return to the peace of the countryside.

guest_experience.quote: An absolute gem — we loved the peace, the space and the warm hospitality.
guest_experience.author: Kees ★ 5 / 5

final_cta.text: We warmly welcome you to our bed & breakfast — a place where peace, comfort and hospitality go hand in hand.

seo.title: B&B Schermer Eylandt – Peace and Space in the Schermer Polder
seo.description: Stay in a historic house in Schermerhorn. Enjoy comfort, quiet and warm hospitality from Bas & Linda.
